page.title: 12 Clubs
page.content: {Youth Club}takes place at the Village Hall every{Thursday}evening. {Brownies}takes place at the Village Hall on{Wednesday}evenings. {Badminton}is held at the Village Hall on{Wednesday}evenings. {W.I.}which is well attended and has flourished for sixty-five years, is held at the Village Hall once a month on{Tuesday.} {Playgroup}takes place on{Tuesday, {Wednesday, Thursday}and{Friday}at 9.00 am. to 12.00 pm. {Mother and Toddler}club is held at the Village Hall on{Monday}2.30 pm. to 4.00 pm. {Cricket, Football}and{Pony Clubs}are run on the village playing-field. {Darby and Joan}(for over 60's) meet every 2 weeks at the Village Hall. There is a thriving{Village Produce {Association.}
